channel.title: Holiday Travel on Stat 150 at Cal Poly
channel.description: Recent content in Holiday Travel on Stat 150 at Cal Poly

item.title: Stats in the News- Holiday Travel!
item.description: Have you ever wondered when the busiest travel days of the year are? Should you fly in a full week before, or on Christmas Eve? Does the Wednesday before Thanksgiving see more passengers than the Tuesday before? When is the best day to travel back home this year? The answers to all these questions and more in the article “These Are the Busiest Days for Holiday Travel This Year” by Jessica Puckett.
